bibl.title: The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997

David R. JORDAN, Hugo MONTGOMERY and Einar THOMASSEN (Edd.), The World of Ancient Magic. Papers from the First International Samson Eitrem Seminar at the Norwegian Institute at Athens, 4-8 May 1997 = Papers from the Norwegian Institute at Athens. 4 (Bergen, 1999) pp. 12-19, 1 portrait.
